Package org.fruit.alayer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Abstractor
    An Abstractor takes a Widget and creates a Finder object, which can be used to find this widget in arbitrary State's.
    Action
    Actions take a system and a state as parameters and operate on the system (e.g. a left click).
    Canvas
    A Canvas is a surface onto which you can draw e.g. lines, rectangles and circles.
    Finder
    A Finder's task is to find a particular widget within a widget tree.
    HitTester  
    Image  
    Navigator  
    Position
    A position is a function that operates on a state and calculates a concrete point.
    Searcher  
    Shape  
    State
    A state describes an SUT's state.
    StateBuilder
    A StateBuilder fetches an SUT's current state.
    SUT
    An SUT is a System Under Test and can be a graphical application, a process, a collection of processes or even a collection of distributed services.
    SystemBuilder  
    Taggable
    Taggable's are a essential part of the FRUIT library.
    UID
    This is a tag-interface for UIDs (Unique Identifiers).
    Visualizer  
    Widget
    A Widget is usually a control element of an SUT.
    WidgetMap

    Role

    SUTBase  
    Tag<T>
    Tags are labels that can be attached to Taggable objects.
    TaggableBase  
    Tags  
    TagsBase  
    UsedResources
    Container to save used resources for an action.
    Verdict
    A Verdict is the outcome of a test oracle.
    WidgetIterator  
    WidgetPosition  
    YieldAll  
    YieldFirst
